subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Horses
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Historically girls have not fared well against boys in Triple Crown races, as since the Belmont Stakes began in 1867, only 21 fillies have challenged the colts, with only 2 successes.
snippet: Historically girls have not fared well against boys in Triple Crown races, as since the Belmont Stakes began in 1867, only 21 fillies have challenged the colts, with only 2 successes.
